content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/WMal12i7YBc”][vc_column_text]

Meetings, Events and Conferences

At the Canterbury International Hotel we regard every event and function as a unique, one off occasion. 

Set the stage for a truly memorable event here at Canterbury International Hotel. Whether you’re organising a conference or meeting, private dinner or romantic wedding reception. Our events team have the expertise to ensure that your event is carried out flawlessly.

We have 8 flexible event spaces, with multiple configurations to cater to your needs. These spaces will seat anywhere between 2 to 200 guests. With packages to suit every budget, the Canterbury International Hotel is the ideal venue!

  • Functions
  • Events

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”rightColumn-Col2″][vc_column_text]

Location and Access

Conveniently located at the gateway to the beautiful Yarra Valley and Dandenong Ranges, and only 20 minutes from Melbourne CBD.

326-330 Canterbury Road
Forest Hill VIC 3133
Australia

Enquire Now
+61 3 9878 4111
Email Us
 Fact Sheets

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
